api_list.api_description: Retrieves a specific entry given its name or ID.

required_parameters.name: entry
required_parameters.description: The name or ID of the entry.

optional_parameters.name: game
optional_parameters.description: The game version to query; defaults to 'botw'.

api_list.api_description: Get details about a specific Pokémon by ID or name.

query: Can you provide information about 'Moblin' from the Hyrule Compendium and also details about 'Pikachu' from the PokéAPI?
